In this script, a form will be displayed with two fields, username and password. When user is submitting with valid user name and password, then he can access authenticated page. In this step we have two logic’s.\n<ul>\n<li>What if the form is submitted.\n<ol>\n<li>If the form is submitted, we are assigning the posted values to variables and checking the values are existing in the database or not.</li>\n<li>If the values submitted in the form and the values in the database are equal, then we will create a session for the user.</li>\n<li>If the values are not equal then it will display an error message.</li>\n<li>And then we checks for the session, if the session exists we will great him with the username, otherwise the form will be displayed.</li>\n</ol>\n</li>\n<li>What if not the form is submitted.\n<ol>\n<li>When the user comes first time, he will be displayed with a simple form.</li>\n<li>User Name, Password and a submit button.</li>\n</ol>\n</li>\n</ul>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<h2>Below is the My Video on User Login, Registration Script in PHP &amp; MySQL</h2>\n<p><iframe width=\"853\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/y3z9b7HJKNk\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\"></iframe></p>\n<div class=\"code-block code-block-3\" style=\"margin: 8px 0;\">\n<div style=\"text-align:center; color: #3c763d;\n    background-color: #dff0d8;\n    border-color: #d6e9c6;    border: 1px solid transparent;\n    border-radius: 4px;\">\n<p style=\"font-size:25px; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"http://codingcyber.com/refer/cc19off/\">Do You Want to Learn Advanced User Login Registration System?</a>\n</p><p>Join Only for $19</p>\n<p></p>\n<p><a href=\"http://codingcyber.com/refer/simple-login-system/\">Download Simple Login System</a></p>\n<p><a href=\"http://codingcyber.com/refer/advanced-login-system/\">Download Advanced User Login &amp; Registration System</a></p>\n</div></div>\n\n<div class=\"box\">\n<h2>1.
